resource_dependency.formBuilderLibrary: A library for creating and editing forms dynamically, such as react-form-builder2 or Form.io.
resource_dependency.workflowEngineAPI: An API for managing custom workflows and process definitions (e.g., Camunda, Node-RED).
resource_dependency.officeDataSchema: Database schema with tables: offices (id, name, location, capacity), departments (id, name, office_id), employees (id, name, department_id).

function: Implement office management module with form design and workflow capabilities
static_description: Displays a dashboard showing office locations, departments, and assigned personnel. Includes a tab for designing office-related forms and another for configuring workflows using formBuilderLibrary and workflowEngineAPI.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Design Form' opens the form builder interface from formBuilderLibrary.
Clicking 'Configure Workflow' loads the workflow engine interface from workflowEngineAPI.

resource_dependency.assetTrackingAPI: An API for scanning QR codes or RFID tags to track physical assets.
resource_dependency.infrastructureDataSchema: Database schema with tables: assets (id, name, category, location, status, last_maintenance), maintenance_logs (id, asset_id, date, description, performed_by).

function: Implement infrastructure management module with asset tracking and maintenance workflows
static_description: Displays a grid of tracked assets with categories, statuses, and maintenance history. Provides buttons to scan new assets via assetTrackingAPI and schedule maintenance tasks.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Scan Asset' triggers integration with assetTrackingAPI to register or update an asset entry.
Clicking 'Schedule Maintenance' creates a new log entry in the maintenance_logs table.

resource_dependency.vendorManagementAPI: External API for retrieving vendor ratings and contact information.
resource_dependency.procurementDataSchema: Database schema with tables: vendors (id, name, contact_info, rating), purchase_orders (id, vendor_id, items, total_cost, status), requisitions (id, requester_id, item_list, approval_status).

function: Implement procurement management module with purchasing processes and vendor management
static_description: Lists active vendors from vendorManagementAPI and displays current purchase orders and requisitions. Allows filtering by status and initiating new procurements.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'New Requisition' navigates to a form for submitting procurement requests.
Clicking 'Approve Order' updates the status field in the purchase_orders table.

resource_dependency.employeeDirectoryAPI: Internal API returning employee profiles and roles.
resource_dependency.personnelDataSchema: Database schema with tables: employees (id, full_name, position, hire_date, role_id), roles (id, title, permissions), departments (id, name).

function: Implement personnel management module with employee records and role-based access control
static_description: Shows an organizational chart and searchable directory of employees. Displays each employeeâ€™s profile and associated role from employeeDirectoryAPI.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking an employee card expands their detailed view including role-specific permissions.
Clicking 'Edit Role' allows updating the role_id field in the employees table.

resource_dependency.budgetTrackingAPI: API for syncing with external financial systems to retrieve real-time budget data.
resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Database schema with tables: budgets (id, fiscal_year, allocated_amount, used_amount, department_id), expenses (id, amount, category, submitter_id, approval_status, date_submitted).

function: Implement financial management module with budget tracking and expense processing
static_description: Presents a dashboard comparing actual vs. allocated budgets per department using data from budgetTrackingAPI. Lists submitted and pending expenses.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Submit Expense' opens a form that saves to the expenses table upon submission.
Clicking 'Approve' changes the approval_status field in the expenses table.

resource_dependency.analyticsDashboardLibrary: Frontend visualization library like Chart.js or D3.js.
resource_dependency.decisionMakingDataSchema: Database schema with tables: reports (id, title, generated_by, created_at, file_path), metrics (id, report_id, metric_name, value).

function: Implement decision-making management module with reporting and analytics dashboards
static_description: Renders interactive charts and graphs built with analyticsDashboardLibrary displaying aggregated metrics from the metrics table. Shows a list of available reports.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Generate Report' inserts a new record into the reports table and generates metric entries.
Clicking a chart filters underlying data points based on selected dimensions.

resource_dependency.authSystemAPI: Authentication API supporting OAuth 2.0 or JWT tokens.
resource_dependency.rbacDataSchema: Database schema with tables: users (id, username, password_hash, role_id), roles (id, title, permission_set), sessions (token, user_id, expires_at).

function: Provide user authentication and authorization system with role-based permissions
static_description: Displays a login form with username/password fields and a 'Login' button. Background uses light pink (#FFB6C1) and buttons use medium violet red (#C71585).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' sends credentials to authSystemAPI and stores session token in sessions table if valid.
Clicking 'Logout' deletes the session token from the client and sessions table.

resource_dependency.searchServiceAPI: API endpoint that accepts queries and returns cross-module results.
resource_dependency.browseDataSchema: Unified search index schema covering entities from all modules: id, type (office/procurement/etc.), title, summary, url.

function: Enable users to browse related information across all management modules
static_description: Features a global search bar at the top of the navigation header. Results appear below grouped by module type.

interaction_and_states.description: As user types, debounced calls are made to searchServiceAPI which returns filtered results.
Clicking a result navigates to the specific entity page within its respective module.

resource_dependency.digitalFormRenderer: Component capable of rendering forms designed via formBuilderLibrary.
resource_dependency.submissionWorkflowAPI: API responsible for routing submissions through defined workflows.
resource_dependency.applicationSubmissionSchema: Database schema with tables: applications (id, form_id, applicant_id, submitted_at, status), application_attachments (id, app_id, file_url).

function: Allow users to submit applications through digital forms with workflow routing
static_description: Renders a filled-out form using digitalFormRenderer when accessed via unique URL. Submit button routes the application through submissionWorkflowAPI.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Submit Application' validates inputs and posts data to submissionWorkflowAPI which updates the status in the applications table.
Clicking 'Attach File' uploads document and adds reference to application_attachments table.

resource_dependency.approvalRoutingAPI: API handling multi-level approval logic with escalation paths.
resource_dependency.approvalDataSchema: Database schema with tables: approvals (id, application_id, approver_id, level, status, decision_timestamp), approvers (id, user_id, hierarchy_level).

function: Implement approval workflows with multi-level authorization capabilities
static_description: Displays a queue of pending approvals relevant to the logged-in user. Each item shows application details and action buttons ('Approve', 'Reject').

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Approve' or 'Reject' sends decision to approvalRoutingAPI which updates the approvals table and moves the workflow forward.
Clicking an item reveals the full application context before making a decision.

resource_dependency.statusQueryAPI: API endpoint returning status updates for any given process instance.
resource_dependency.processStatusSchema: Database schema with tables: process_instances (id, process_type, initiated_by, start_time, end_time, status), status_updates (id, instance_id, message, timestamp).

function: Enable status querying for all submitted applications and processes
static_description: Presents a timeline view showing historical status updates fetched from statusQueryAPI. Filters allow sorting by process type and date range.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a process instance expands to show detailed status_updates messages.
Clicking 'Refresh Status' re-fetches latest updates from statusQueryAPI and redraws the timeline.

resource_dependency.leaveRequestForm: Predefined digital form template for leave requests.
resource_dependency.leaveManagementAPI: Handles leave calculations and policy enforcement.
resource_dependency.leaveDataSchema: Database schema with tables: leave_requests (id, employee_id, start_date, end_date, reason, status), leave_balances (id, employee_id, annual_leave_remaining, sick_leave_remaining).

function: Include leave management functionality with request and approval workflows
static_description: Provides a calendar-style interface to visualize approved leaves and a panel to submit new leave requests using leaveRequestForm.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Request Leave' opens leaveRequestForm modal and submits data to leaveManagementAPI which stores in leave_requests table.
Clicking 'Approve/Deny' updates the status column in the leave_requests table.

resource_dependency.travelDeclarationForm: Customizable form for recording travel declarations outside city limits.
resource_dependency.specialApprovalWorkflowAPI: Workflow handler enforcing special approval chains for sensitive operations.
resource_dependency.travelDataSchema: Database schema with tables: travel_declarations (id, cadre_id, destination, departure_time, return_time, justification, status), cadre_profiles (id, name, rank, supervisor_id).

function: Implement middle-level cadres leaving Shenzhen tracking with special approval processes
static_description: Displays a list of travel declarations submitted by cadres along with their current approval stage. Includes quick filter options by cadre name or approval status.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Declare Travel' opens travelDeclarationForm and routes submission through specialApprovalWorkflowAPI.
Clicking 'Escalate Approval' manually advances the declaration to next approver level in cadre_profiles hierarchy.

resource_dependency.attendanceTrackerAPI: Integration with biometric devices or manual check-in tools.
resource_dependency.attendanceReportingAPI: Generates time-based summaries and exports attendance reports.
resource_dependency.attendanceDataSchema: Database schema with tables: attendance_records (id, employee_id, check_in_time, check_out_time, duration), monthly_reports (id, employee_id, month, hours_worked, absences).

function: Include attendance management with time tracking and reporting features
static_description: Shows daily attendance logs and monthly summaries. Offers export options (PDF, Excel) via attendanceReportingAPI.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Check In' records current timestamp in attendance_records via attendanceTrackerAPI.
Clicking 'Export Report' calls attendanceReportingAPI to generate downloadable summary.

resource_dependency.fivePowersFormBuilder: Customized version of formBuilderLibrary allowing complex conditional logic.
resource_dependency.circulationEngineAPI: API for circulating documents among predefined stakeholders.
resource_dependency.powersDataSchema: Database schema with tables: power_forms (id, title, definition_json, creator_id), circulation_paths (id, form_instance_id, recipient_id, order_index, completed_at).

function: Implement 'five powers' management with customizable form designs and process circulation
static_description: Interface includes tabs for designing new 'five powers' forms using fivePowersFormBuilder and viewing active circulation paths.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Save Form Design' serializes the form structure into JSON and stores in power_forms table.
Clicking 'Start Circulation' triggers circulationEngineAPI which populates circulation_paths according to defined rules.
